info.description: Provides create, read, update and delete functionality for Azure SQL Database resources including servers, databases, elastic pools, recommendations, operations, and usage metrics.
info.title: Azure SQL Database

parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.
parameters.name: api-version

parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: The name of the server.
parameters.name: serverName

parameters.description: The name of the database.
parameters.name: databaseName

schema.description: The response to a list database metric definitions request.

value.description: The list of metric definitions for the database.

metricAvailabilities.description: The list of database metric availabilities for the metric.

retention.description: The length of retention for the database metric.

timeGrain.description: The granularity of the database metric.

name.description: The name information for the metric.

localizedValue.description: The friendly name of the database metric.

value.description: The name of the database metric.

primaryAggregationType.description: The primary aggregation type defining how metric values are displayed.

resourceUri.description: The resource uri of the database.

parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

parameters.description: The name of the server.

parameters.description: The name of the database.
parameters.name: databaseName

parameters.description: An OData filter expression that describes a subset of metrics to return.
parameters.name: $filter

schema.description: The response to a list database metrics request.

value.description: The list of metrics for the database.

endTime.description: The end time for the metric (ISO-8601 format).

metricValues.description: The metric values for the specified time window and timestep.

average.description: The average value of the metric.

count.description: The number of values for the metric.

maximum.description: The max value of the metric.

minimum.description: The min value of the metric.

total.description: The total value of the metric.

name.description: The name information for the metric.

localizedValue.description: The friendly name of the database metric.

value.description: The name of the database metric.

startTime.description: The start time for the metric (ISO-8601 format).

timeGrain.description: The time step to be used to summarize the metric values.
